name: Space Dizzy Travel
description:
You are a spaceship on a mission to rescue all the astronauts lost inside some asteroid caves before they run out of oxygen. But be careful; your spaceship has some intricate controls.

Controls:

W A S D -> To control the spaceship propellers

This is a small project we made to test some mechanics. We may add some new features in the future:

- New levels
-Leaderboard

We hope you like the concept.
